name: Apple Logo Artwork
description:
The Apple logo has never looked this good.

Apple sent out unique media invites back in 2018, it created tons of unique, colorful versions of its logo, and everyone seemingly received a different style on their invitation. The artwork for the Apple logos varies from the abstract to the classic, with Apple tapping multiple artists for the design.


As it turns out, there were more than 350 one-of-a-kind Apple logos created for the event invites.


And these are just stunning piece of art. Best invites they have ever sent.
